title: Hailee Steinfeld looks stunning in a tartan co-ord as she joins Dickinson co-stars at a preview
text:
She will portray poet Emily Dickinson in the hotly anticipated television series.

And Hailee Steinfeld dazzled in a dramatic black and white co-ord as she joined her Dickinson co-stars at Apple Regent Street in London on Tuesday.

The Edge of Seventeen star, 22, sat alongside actress Jane Krakowski, 51, and the creator of Dickinson, Alena Smith, to discuss the show after a preview was played.

Star: Hailee Steinfeld dazzled in a dramatic black and white co-ord as she joined her Dickinson co-stars at Apple Regent Street in London on Tuesday

Hailee wore a brown tartan trouser and bandeau two piece underneath a black leather jacket for the event.

She slipped into a pair of diagonally striped black and yellow stilettos with a pointed toe and diamante bow.

And her brunette tresses were left to fall in their usual gentle waves before being pulled over one shoulder.

Team: The Edge of Seventeen star, 22, sat alongside actress Jane Krakowski (left), 51, and the creator of Dickinson, Alena Smith (centre), to discuss the show after a preview was played

A winged eyeliner allowed her eyes to pop as the star finished the look with a nude lip and lightly bronzed cheeks.

Jane Krakowski looked stunning as she wowed in a long-sleeved black velvet mini dress complete with silver sparkles.

She pulled on a pair of leather over-the-knee black boots with a pointed toe and wore a pair of diamond studs in her ears.

Stunning: Jane Krakowski looked stunning as she wowed in a long-sleeved black velvet mini dress complete with silver sparkles

Dickinson's creator Alena wore a cheetah patterned knee-length dress which showed off her shoulders as she cosied up with her show's stars.

She wore her auburn hair pinned back and kept warm in a pair of black tights and comfortable ankle boots.

Dickinson is getting buzz as a historical series that will be anything but a sleepy costume drama, with a focus on female empowerment and freedom of expression.

Dickinson will premiere on November 1 on Apple TV+.

Hailee is currently rumoured to be joining the Marvel Cinematic Universe as the potential successor to the mantle of Hawkeye.

At the young age of 14, Hailee was nominated for an Academy Award for her supporting role in the Coen brothers' western film True Grit.

She has gone on to star in the Pitch Perfect films, Romeo and Juliet, and the Transformers film Bumblebee.
description: She will portray poet Emily Dickinson in her latest hotly anticipated role.
